intro.title: Software Engineer
intro.description: Welcome! I'm EL HANAFI, a passionate software engineer based in Casablanca, Morocco. I specialize in building innovative and scalable digital solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's connect and bring your vision to life.

about.description: Software Engineer with a passion for programming and problem-solving. Proficient in full-stack development with Spring and Angular, and experienced in delivering impactful solutions at leading companies. I thrive on crafting clean, efficient code and transforming complex ideas into real-world applications.
about.interests: Outside of work, I'm interested in following the developments of science. I also play a lot of video games. And watch series.

contact.description: I enjoy discussing new projects and design challenges. Please share as much info as possible so we can get the most out of our first catch-up.

form.subject: Subject
form.sendEmailDescription: Write your message below and click "Send" to open your email client.

cliffford.title: Cliffford
cliffford.description: Chatbot with hand gesture control using computer vision and neural networks. Includes real-time data sync and user authentication.

pokerPlanning.title: Poker Planning
pokerPlanning.description: Web tool for team estimation with live voting and real-time updates. Supports interactive sessions for planning tasks.

tawajooh.title: Tawajooh
tawajooh.description: Web app to manage student applications. Handles form submission, document tracking, and status updates.

hospitalManagement.title: Hospital Management
hospitalManagement.description: Desktop app for scheduling, patient records, and doctor availability. Includes data storage and caching.

blogger.title: Blogger
blogger.description: Platform for creating and managing blog posts. Includes user login, editing, and comment features.

ensetCandidature.title: ENSET Candidature
ensetCandidature.description: Admissions management tool for schools. Supports application tracking, evaluation, and scoring.

astreintEase.title: AstreintEase
astreintEase.description: Web app for managing on-call requests with approval workflows and calendar sync. Built using microservices.

orangeStaffing.title: Orange Staffing
orangeStaffing.description: Tool for handling internal recruitment. Manages job listings, applications, and interview scheduling.

inetum.title: Software Engineer
inetum.description: Worked on a financial system used by local authorities in France. Built and updated features, handled real-time data, and took part in team sprints.

orangeBusinessServices.title: Software Engineer
orangeBusinessServices.description1: Developed backend and frontend for a request validation tool. Set up microservices with service discovery, load balancing, and external config.
orangeBusinessServices.description2: Created a tool for managing hiring steps from posting to selection. Used rapid development tools to speed up setup and deployment.

cegedim.title: Software Engineer
cegedim.description: Built a real-time web app for team planning sessions. Used WebSockets for live updates and handled voting and interaction logic.

men.title: Software Engineer
men.description: Developed "Tawajooh", a student application management system that streamlined administrative processes for students.
